channel.title: Comments on: Friday Go Forward: Week 30

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. Freelancing is still rather rough. And not freelancing does not make you a bad person. Haha. It's clear you know where your priorities are. Mine are clearly haywire. XD And thanks for the congrats! Haha. Looks like I definitely don't get a handicap from you according to KGS anymore. =P
item.content:encoded:
Haha. Freelancing is still rather rough. And not freelancing does not make you a bad person. Haha. It’s clear you know where your priorities are. Mine are clearly haywire. XD
And thanks for the congrats! Haha. Looks like I definitely don’t get a handicap from you according to KGS anymore. =P

item.title: By: Nate Eagle
item.dc:creator: Nate Eagle
item.content:encoded:
“Chi­nese, free­lanc­ing, blog­ging, and go while work­ing full-time and hav­ing some sort of social life…”
I’m exhausted just thinking about it. I could never really handle even freelancing + working full-time. I just didn’t have the dedication to pour my outside time into the safe stuff I did while at work. Does that make me a bad person? Yes.
Congratulations on the 4k bump – I could finally play you a rated game without giving you a handicap! (Not that I plan on it.)
